None.Name: Screech
None.Description: Every 3 seconds, unit can perform a piercing shriek that deals 170 damage to enemies in a 5m radius around its target, up to 250 in total. Only affects ground targets.

None.Name: Sonic Scream
None.Description: Activate to fill a target area with sonic shockwaves, doing 500 damage to enemy units, up to 900 in total. Knocks back small and medium units. Only affects ground targets. Reusable every 10 seconds.
